ComicInfo.Summary: In the space of mere days, the world has irrevocably changed! Before, we were divided by many things. Now, all we have is one purpose: to stop the invasion of Earth! Gathered in small groups to train as units, we must forget our previous lives – whatever they may have been – and become soldiers. Amidst all this is a chilling discovery made beneath the shattered streets of Berlin…
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-03 08:12:32. [CVDB118282]
ComicInfo.Characters: Audrey Martin, Devon McNeil, Ernesto Cardenal, Gabriel Contreras, Hannibal, Kris Nelson, Lucia Contreras, Preston Walker, Raisa, Sadiq Al-Asmari, Sruelik Mendelsohn
